text:
Hi,

I am a full stack marketeer, with extensive experience in HubSpot and other CRM platforms. Besides I am proficient with SQL, and basic python for API, ETL. I am currently looking for remote roles where I can contribute my knowhow. Please reach out to me here, or on Linkedin ( <https://www.linkedin.com/in/georgiana-costache> ) if you are searching for someone with my background. Thanks in advance for your time and trust!
